author: Generatoror
long_description:
You play as a robot forced to do the same routine every day, even bound by your code, you decide enough is enough and try to escape.

A half assed proof of concept puzzle game; Don't expect much.
name: robot_escape
short_description: You play as a robot forced to do the same routine every day, even bound by your code, you decide enough is enough and try to escape
title: Robot Escape
